aiInstructions.title: Additional Instructions for AI
aiInstructions.description: Provide additional context and instructions that client-facing agents should follow when assisting your customers.

form.label: Additional Instructions
form.placeholder: Enter additional instructions for the AI agent...
form.description: These instructions will be provided to the AI when responding to customer inquiries

domains.title: Verified Domains
domains.description: Verify domains to enable custom tool integrations with your systems.

empty.title: No verified domains
empty.description: Add a domain to enable custom tool integrations

verification.instructions: To verify this domain, choose one of the following options
verification.option1Description: Add a TXT record to your domain's DNS

form.label: Domain Name
form.description: Enter the domain name you want to verify (without http:// or https://)

tools.title: Custom Tools
tools.description: Create and manage custom tools that (SMART) client-facing agents can use to integrate with your systems.

empty.title: No custom tools
empty.description: Create your first custom tool to start integrating with external systems.

createTool.title: Custom Tool (our chatbot can create them for you)

addDomain.title: Add Domain
addDomain.description: Enter the domain name you want to verify and use for custom tools.

name.label: Tool Name
name.description: Unique name for this tool (lowercase, no spaces)

description.label: Description
description.description: Detailed description of the tool's purpose and functionality

url.label: URL
url.description: The full URL where the tool will make requests

method.label: HTTP Method
method.description: HTTP method to use for requests

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether this tool is available for use

guestAccess.label: Guest Access
guestAccess.description: Allow the tool to be used by non-logged users
